alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Livingston (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 05 at 1:03AM CDT until August 06 at 5:26PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Thompson River at Trenton affecting Grundy and Livingston Counties. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Thompson River at Trenton. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Low lying areas north of the gage are flooded. At 30.0 feet, Backwater along the Weldon River causes flooding at Northwest 22nd Avenue and Route A north of Trenton. At 31.0 feet, Southwest 30th Avenue floods a quarter mile south of Highway 6. In addition, backwater flooding along Muddy Creek begins to affect Morningsun Drive in southeast Trenton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 25.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 29.7 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
